_header: Saint Edmund the holy king I-bore was here by east
Subjects: saints’ lives; Edmund, king of England, saint, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, f. 199: prose.
_description: Life of St. Edmund the King in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn edmond þe kyng of wan we makeþ festeOf þe on
                    ende of engelond kyng was bi este…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor þe loue of seynt edmond þat was so noble
                    kyngGrante ous þe Ioie þat he is Inne after our
                    endyng

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint edemond þe holy kyng of wham we makeþ gret festeof
                    þe on ende of ingelonde king was her be este…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Nou god for þe loue of seint edemond þat was so noble a
                    kyngGraunte vs þe ioye þat he is in after oure ending

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Eadmund þe holie kyng I bore was here bi esteIn þe
                    on ende of Engelonde of ȝwam men makieȝ feste…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Novþe god for þe loue of Seint Eadmund þat was so
                    noble kingGraunte us þe Ioye þat he is Inne aftur ovre
                    ending
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 296-9.
Hervey,  Lord Francis. 
             Corolla Sancti Edmundi.
         London: J. Murray, 1907: 362-6.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Edmond þe holy king of whom we make festeOf þat on
                    ende of engelond king he was here bi este…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou god for þe loue of seint Edmond þat was so noble
                    kingGraunte vs þe Ioye þat he is inne After oure
                    ending
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Saynt Edmonde þe haly kynge of whome we make grete festeOf ane
                    ende of Ingelande he was kynge be esteffor of Sothfolke he was he was kynge
                    of al þat contre wydeffor þat tyme was in Inglande was
                    kyngeȝ on ilke a syde…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Now god for saynt Edmonde lufe þat was þe noble
                    kyngeGraunte vs at our dede day þe blisse withoute endynge

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Edmund þe holy kyng of whan we makeþ ffesteOf
                    þe on ende of Engelonde kyng was by heste…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now ffor þe loue of Seint Edmund þat was so noble a
                    kyngGod vs graunte þe ioye þat he is ynne after oure
                    endyng

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint edmond þe holi king of wham we makeþ gret festeof þe on ende of englond king was here by este…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of seint edmond þat was so noble kinggraunte ous þe ioie þat he is Inne & ȝiue ous god ending

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Edmund þe holy kyng kyng was here by estOf þe oon
                    ende Of Englond of whom men make grete feste…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe love of saynt Edmund þe
                    kyngȜeue vs þe ioye þat he is ynne after oure endynge
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Edmonde þe kynge of whom we make gret festeOn þe
                    oon ende of engelonde a litel here by Este…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…God for þe loue of him þat was so noble a
                    kyngeGraunte vs þe Ioye þat he is Inne after our endynge.
                    Amen.
